title: Rose Garden
tip: Choose a sunny location. Amend soil well. Prune in spring. Water deeply weekly. Use balanced fertilizer.

title: Herb Oasis
tip: Provide good drainage. Prefers full sun. Plant with vegetables. Harvest regularly. Great for pots.

title: Citrus Grove
tip: Well-drained soil essential. Protect from frost. Fertilize in spring. Water consistently. Prune for shape.

title: Companion Planting Harmony
tip: Boost your garden's health by practicing companion planting, like placing basil near tomatoes for natural pest control and improved flavor.

title: Succulent Serenity
tip: Create a serene succulent garden with well-draining soil, minimal watering, and a variety of shapes and colors for visual appeal.
